comments:
My local Mylar install appears to be broken: task list shows only local tasks, all repository tasks are gone. Repository definitions still exist, also when starting eclipse, the repository tasks are still queries, as I can see the popup notification.
Any ideas where the quries/tasks might have gone?

Thanks,
Andi

This is probably due to a broken installation, e.g. if you used automatic updates and only part of the feature installed and not the rest.  For troubleshooting see:

http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/Mylar_FAQ#Installation_Troubleshooting

After you have updated to the latest and ensured that you installed the connector you need, if you are still missing tasks you can restore your task list:

http://wiki.eclipse.org/index.php/Mylar_FAQ#Task_List_backup_and_restore

Also, if you see any messages in your Error Log please post them here.

Rob: I'm offline most of today so follow up with Andreas if this doesn't resolve his problem.

Reinstalling and restoring backup brought the queries back, thanks. The log file still shows this exception- no obvious problem though.
